segments.text: Please give me a piece of ' New York Daily ' .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are late . The last piece has sold out .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? Is there ' Wall Street Journal ' , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There are several , take a piece . The crash appears in the headline . It is famous for offering catastrophe stories .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have a long flight for ten hours . I need to choose a magazine .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There are various magazines in the rack .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Give me the latest issue of ' National Geographic ' .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's the top magazine in America and is popular with young people . OK . It is totally 30 dollars .
segments.speaker: S2
